Text: RE Advicepst Vince Thank you so much for your advice It was wonderful to get you perspective on the future in these crazy times I will definitely take your advice and find all of my opportunities right now If you have a chance please forward on to my your personal email and I will keep in touch Thank you again Jason Original Message From Kaminski Vince J Sent Tuesday January PM To Jennaro Jason Subject RE Advice Jason Please give me a call at and we can meet for coffee Vince Original Message From Jennaro Jason Sent Tuesday January PM To Kaminski Vince J Subject Advice Vince I have never had a chance to formally meet you but many people have said that you would be a wonderful person to talk to seek advice from I have a couple of directions that I am considering for careers right now in risk management and it would mean a lot to me to be able to sit down with you for a little bit to get your perspective Is there anyway I could buy you coffee or lunch sometime over the week or so Thanks Jason Jennaro

RE Advicepst Vince Let me know if you have an opening in your schedule over the next few days to grab a coffee Thank you again Jason Original Message From Kaminski Vince J Sent Tuesday January PM To Jennaro Jason Subject RE Advice Jason Please give me a call at and we can meet for coffee Vince Original Message From Jennaro Jason Sent Tuesday January PM To Kaminski Vince J Subject Advice Vince I have never had a chance to formally meet you but many people have said that you would be a wonderful person to talk to seek advice from I have a couple of directions that I am considering for careers right now in risk management and it would mean a lot to me to be able to sit down with you for a little bit to get your perspective Is there anyway I could buy you coffee or lunch sometime over the week or so Thanks Jason Jennaro

Advicepst Vince I have never had a chance to formally meet you but many people have said that you would be a wonderful person to talk to seek advice from I have a couple of directions that I am considering for careers right now in risk management and it would mean a lot to me to be able to sit down with you for a little bit to get your perspective Is there anyway I could buy you coffee or lunch sometime over the week or so Thanks Jason Jennaro
CoffeePST Hey Hunter Let me know if you have time for coffee today or tomorrow Will stay inside to avoid the media Jason

CoffeePST Hey Hunter I wanted to see if youd be interested in Coffee sometime soon I have a couple directions that I could pursue right now and wanted to bounce them off of you to get your perspective I really respect your opinion and Id love to get your take if you have some time Jason

ReminiscencesPST Hey Hunter Okay here are the Secrets I have learned from Reminiscences of a Stock Operator You have any more Real money is made on understanding market trends not individual fluctuations Understand the power of large market participants Try to achieve their power Never Buy on a Tipster If something is wrong and you dont know why get out Understand your physiological and psychological gut for a stock JJ

Quick QuestionHunter Thanks again for the Coffee I really enjoyed hearing your take on the industry and actually I really enjoyed your interview as well I love to debate especially economic theorypolitics which made your interview amazing to me Quick Question I apologize for not having a pen when we grabbed coffee Im having difficulty remembering the books you recommended Would you remind again Jason

Quick QuestionPST Hey Hunter I know I have been missing you for coffee lately but Rogers Herndon recommend I bounce a quick question off of you He mentioned that it was possible that if enough people bail from UBS there may be a spot there for me Do you think that it is possible that I could squeeze in Jason

MeetingGreg I am a new Associate from Georgetown and I am very excited to be part of Enron I hope to earn great success in the future and will work tremendously hard to show my very best here I would enjoy an opportunity to sit down for lunch with you to hear your perspective on the company and success factors I think you would be an excellent person to talk to for two reasons Your success in the Associate Program and extensive multidivisional experience within the company Your advanced knowledge of drivers and opportunities within the energy industry Regards Jason Jennaro
